text:
Liga
Real Madrid: Guti bounces in Spain (official)
In search of team, the former Madrid has been officialized by Almeria, and will therefore lead in the Spanish second division.
05 Nov 2019, 08:20 by Thomas Rassouli



Eden HazardClub previous: ChelseaCompensation: 100 million eurosIcon Sport



Luka JovicClub previous: Eintracht FrankfurtIndemnity: 60 million eurosIcon Sport



Eder Militao Previous club: FC PortoCompensation: 50 million eurosIcon Sport



Ferland MendyClub previous: Olympique LyonnaisIndemnity: 48 million eurosIcon Sport



RodrygoClub previous: SantosCompensation: 45 million eurosIcon Sport



Alphonse AreolaClub previous: Paris Saint-GermainIndemnity: none (ready) Icon Sport



Takefusa KuboClub previous: FC TokyoIndemnity: noneIcon Sport

Real Madrid: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




After a good career as a player at Real Madrid, Guti's ambition is to succeed as a coach. It is no longer a secret, the former merengue had been looking for a bench for a while, and had to choose to join Besiktas to continue to gain experience. Finally, he will know his first challenge in Almeria, in the Spanish second division. The club formalized the news late in the evening last night.








Goal Liga




Guti + 7 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

With Galactic at its head, Almeria has the ambitious project to move into the first division this season, and we can say that the challenge is currently well underway. Dauphin of Cadiz, the UD has 24 points in 14 games, 10 points behind the leader.
